title: Freshwater dive
creator_credit: Hugh Macdonald, David H. Fowler and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Three underwater enthusiasts explore one of the world’s largest freshwater springs, the Pupu Springs in New Zealand’s Nelson Province.
